hophead noun [C]
(DRUG ADDICT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
US slang someone who takes illegal drugs: He lost his way a bit after college and lived in a community of hopheads and petty criminals for a while. He smoked a bit of dope, but he wasn't a hophead.
More examplesFewer examplesThe police officer was frustrated as he was always busting hopheads instead of doing real police work.

hophead noun [C]
(BEER DRINKER)
informal someone who likes beer, especially beer made with lots of hops (= the dried fruits of a climbing plant, used to give a bitter flavour to beer): The high hop content of their new beer is sure to make it a hit with serious hopheads. Even if you're not a hophead, you should try some of the huge selection of beers in this bar.
More examplesFewer examplesI'm a confirmed hophead and will always choose beer over wine.This IPA will satisfy even the most demanding of hopheads.
